name: Beat Fire Go — Shoot Beat Up!
name_original: Beat Fire Go — Shoot Beat Up!
description:
Enjoy new popular and unique music game! Totally new with gun sounds and special effects!

Take aim & Shot Beat Up! Gun sounds and EDM beats!

You will never stop this game! Do not miss!

Let’s play!

⁃ Color Tiles fall with Beats!
⁃ Take Aim and shoot tiles!
⁃ Let your finger dances with beats.

Why millions choose Beat Fire Go?

- Great list EDM songs! Enjoy the DJ’s selections and Hip-Hop music! Take a music trip!
- Gun sounds remix in battlefield! Shoot! Beat! Blast!
